summary: high-res weapons: Sting, Legolas' bow and daggers, Witch King Sword, Sauron's Mace, Narsil, Anduril, Glamdring, and Morgul Blade from Lord of the Rings
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/5727-1-1354509752.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=6][color=pink][center][b]Isilmeriel's LOTR Weapon Collection[/b][/center][/color][/size]SSE version (untested):Â https://mods.bethesda.net/#en/workshop/skyrim/mod-detail/3031540

Keep an eye out for the [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29730]Isillenia Retextures[/url], courtesy of Millenia.

Upload your own awesome screenies!

------------
Version: 4
Dec 2, 2012
------------

The updated version of my Narsil & Anduril mod, now merged with my other and any future weapon mods. One thing I would really appreciate is if people could stop complaining about the proportions (too long, too narrow) of the weapons. They were modelled exactly to WETA prop photos so if anything, blame WETA.

Version 3.5 removed the ability to craft these weapons at any forge. Instead, to reduce the spam of the crafting menu, the weapons may be crafted exclusively at the Moonforge, located halfway along the path to High Hrothgar.[color=red]For reasons stated I will never add them back to the regular forges.[/color] [color=yellow]Note: Moonforge is not the lunar forge.[/color]

[size=5][color=green][center][b]Weapons[/b][/center][/color][/size]
[list]
[*]Wraith Greatsword (two versions: ancient and polished)
[*]Sting (also includes a glowing version named Spiderbane)
[*]Elven Short Blades (Legolas' daggers)
[*]Elven Longbow (Legolas' bow)
[*]Witch-king Sword
[*]Sauron's Mace (see instructions below)
[*]Anduril and Narsil (one- and two-handed versions)
[*]Shard of Narsil (dagger)
[*]Glamdring (three versions: ancient, regular, and polished)
[*]Morgul blade (dagger)
[/list]
... more to come

[center][youtube]w8HVrLeil1w[/youtube] [youtube]HuB2mfSWwkM[/youtube][/center]

[size=5][color=green][center][b]Features[/b][/center][/color][/size]
[list]
[*]Scabbards
[*]All weapons craftable
[*]Realistic metal material with reflection
[*]Upgradable
[*]High resolution, hand-painted textures
[*]Unenchanted for freedom of customization
[/list]

[size=5][color=green][center][b]Installation[/b][/center][/color][/size]
[list]
[*]unRAR the content in skyrimdata, enable isilNarsil.esp as with any other skyrim mod.
[*]some swords are sold by Eorlund at the skyforge
[*][b]You must have the [color=red]steel smithing perk[/color] to craft most of the weapons[/b]
[*]all weapons craftable at the [color=red]Moonforge[/color] (except the Shard of Narsil, which must be crafted at a smelter)
[*]the [color=red]Moonforge[/color] can be easily located half way up along the path to High Hrothgar (it's that tallest mountain in Skyrim, Throat of the World)
[*]To obtain the enchanted Sauron's Mace, go to Blackreach City and defeat its guardian at the city gate (Should be fairly easy to find) and loot from its body.
[/list]

[size=5][color=green][center][b]Fix Log[/b][/center][/color][/size]
jan 9, 2012 : fixed upgrading, reduced price, improved damage, and added two-handed version for each sword.
jan 11, 2012: added scabbard
jan 24, 2012: craftable. Narsil can be smelted down to a broken version
jan 26, 2012: swords now appear correctly angled in inventory view
feb 15, 2012: version 2.00 - merged with my other lotr weapons
feb 23: added Sauron's Mace
mar 4 : added witchking sword, Sauron's mace now craftable, Morgul Blade changed to dagger
may 5 : added Legolas' bow and daggers, fixed Morgul Blade (it's a silent dagger now)

[center]* * *[/center]

[color=red]Please contact me for explicit permission before using any of my mod resources for your own work and credit authorship accordingly.[/color]

Please pm me if you find any other issues or have suggestions, I'll get to them as soon as I can.


[size=5][color=green][center][b]Acknowledgements[/b][/center][/color][/size]
Special thanks goes to:

- BGS from [url=http://www.moddb.com/mods/merp-middle-earth-roleplaying-project]the MERP team[/url], for rigging and exporting the bow
- DigitalLion, for helping me resolve the two-handed sword crash
- DFG, Dalm, and others for showcase videos and reviews.
- Mergweq, EwokJedi, and Dahaka002011, for creating the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9614]Armed to the Teeth[/url] mod used in screenshots
- WETA, for the wonderful original weapon designs

[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/5727-1-1336193196.png[/img][/center]
author: Isilmeriel
